channel.title: Emotion Tab
channel.description: Does anybody know how to edit the teleports in the emotion tab at allstarscape? I have looked through every file but I can't find a thing.

item.title: Emotion Tab
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

someone2:

Does anybody know how to edit the teleports in the emotion tab at allstarscape? I have looked through every file but I can’t find a thing.

case 162 and case 169
change the customCommand(“commandhere”)
to whatever command you want, go to texthandler.java and say you changed case 162: and case 169:
look for something like this: Train", 181);
that’ll be 169
look for also

veng", 178);

that’s 162
change to the commands and text you want

Read full topic
